title: “Still Fighting for Breath: a patient survey of the challenges and impact of severe asthma” Paraskevi Katsaounou, Mikaela Odemyr, Otto Spranger, Michael E. Hyland, Claus Kroegel, Lorena Garcia Conde, Robin Gore, Francesco Menzella, Christian Domingo Ribas, Mario Morais-Almeida, Matthias Gasser and Ismail Kasujee. ERJ Open Res 2018; 4: 00076-2018.
